Accountant Job at Kanselor Business Innovation Campus Limited




        
    

        
        Kanselor Business Innovation Campus Limited is a Business operation management, market storm promotion, recruitment, product lauch and sales inventory management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
Job Location: Aba, Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Responsible for managing financial records, preparing reports, handling inventory-related accounting, and ensuring compliance in a fast-paced FMCG environment.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Record daily financial transactions and maintain accurate ledgers.
	Prepare monthly financial statements, bank reconciliations, and cash flow reports.
	Monitor inventory movements, cost of sales, and stock valuations.
	Process supplier invoices, payments, and staff reimbursements.
	Manage receivables, follow up on outstanding payments, and reconcile customer accounts.
	Support budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis.
	Ensure tax compliance and assist with audits.
	Maintain proper documentation and internal controls.


Key Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND in Accounting or related field.
	2 – 5 years of accounting experience, preferably in FMCG.
	ICAN certified or ICAN in-view (mandatory).
	Strong knowledge of financial reporting, inventory accounting, and cost analysis.
	Proficient in accounting software (QuickBooks, Sage, ERP).
	Strong analytical skills, accuracy, and attention to detail.
	Ability to work in a high-volume, fast-paced environment.


Salary
N200,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: nkem.kiyix@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Direct Sales Agent Job at ACE Recruiters Limited




        
    

        
        
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    

ACE Recruiters Limited (RC: 1397156) commenced operations March 2017. We are a People and Business Management Consulting firm passionate about adding value. We offer services in the areas of Strategic Human Resource Consulting and we have the capacity to ensure returns on investment in the following areas: Outsourcing – Personnel, Sales & Business Process Human Resources Consulting Training and Development Sales Support – Market Intelligence, Promotion & Activation With a strong drive to be one of the best in our areas of core competences, we pride ourselves as specialists in our chosen field of endeavour. We are driven by a sense of mutually beneficial relationships with our clients, striving to create high performance teams, and deliver agile operations that responds and drives the ever changing ways of doing business/working.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Direct Sales Agent

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Meeting or exceeding weekly, monthly, and yearly sales targets.
	Canvassing assigned territories to present company products to potential customers.
	Assisting management in identifying viable marketing and pricing strategies.
	Demonstrating product features to customers.
	Contacting leads and setting up appointments to present company products.
	Completing order forms and submitting them for processing.
	Attending trade shows and other industry-related events.
	Preparing sales proposals for potential buyers.
	Completing regular sales reports specifying the number of sales made.


Requirements


	OND qualification / Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related field is advantageous.
	Proven sales experience.
	The ability to retain important information.
	Sound consultative selling skills.
	Excellent networking skills.
	Strong negotiation skills.
	Effective communication skills.
	Exceptional customer service skills.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000
